title: Remote Blended Chemistry Laboratory Education Program

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Chemistry lab education in blended learning environments using personalized experiment kits. Cultivates practical skills by combining online theoretical learning with hands-on assignments.

learning_goals: Demonstrate 100% mastery of laboratory safety regulations and the ability to create applicable safety protocols
Accurately perform five or more core chemistry experiments (titration, chromatography, etc.) and write analytical reports

Learners systematically document experimental processes in five stages (preparation, execution, observation, analysis, conclusion) using digital tools (e.g., Google Docs, Evernote, LabArchives) on smartphones or tablets, submitting at least three types of evidence (photos/videos/data sheets) per stage to meet 80% or more of evaluation criteria.
Submit three or more revised experimental design proposals incorporating peer feedback from online discussion platforms
Achieve a composite score of 80+ on formative assessments (quizzes, journals, practical evaluations)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
